    private void btn3ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                     
        //System.exit(0);
        int ans;
        ans=JOptionPane.showConfirmDialog(null,"Do you  want to quit" ,"Quitting", JOptionPane.YES_NO_OPTION,JOptionPane.QUESTION_MESSAGE);
        if(ans==JOptionPane.YES_OPTION)
        {
            System.exit(0);
        }
    }                                    

    private void btn2ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                     
        // TODO add your handling code here:
        txtF1.setText("");
        txtf2.setText("");
        txtF1.requestFocus();
        
    }                                    

    private void btn1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                     
        // TODO add your handling code here:
        String str=txtF1.getText();
        try
        {
        int km=Integer.parseInt(str);
        int meter=km*1000;
        txtf2.setText(String.valueOf(meter));
        }
        catch(NumberFormatException ex)
        {
            JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, "Please Enter digit only!","Error!", JOptionPane.ERROR_MESSAGE);
            txtF1.setText("");
        }
    }

     * @param args the command line arguments

        });
    }
